altername_name: SpongeBob and Friends: Battle for Volcano Island
Bob Esponja y sus Amigos: Batalla por la Isla del Volcan
name: Nicktoons Battle for Volcano Island
overview: Join SpongeBob, Timmy Tuner, and Danny Phantom in an all out battle to stop the evil Mawgu from taking control of Volcano Island! Features • Play as SpongeBob, Danny Phantom, Timmy Turner • Find special objects and power ups to help your favorite Nicktoons character conquer each level • Non-stop action and adventure battling Island monsters • Three different game modes: Single Play, Download Play, and Wireless Play • Multi-player capabilities
